title: Apple of My Eye
description: Delve into the dark depths of Amy Grech's unique style of horror with 13 of her most disturbing stories including:Ashes to AshesJack had been dead for less than a year when Sara finds the throbbing pile of dust next to the washing machine. Then she discovers his ashes are missing...Come and GoneAfter his love had left him, one man attempts to find the key to unlock the reasons why and to finally understand what has come and gone.Apple of My EyeIn candy apple red high heels and a red leather dress, a piercing daddy's girl trolls a Village bar for what she craves and finds a not-so-gentle man to give her a fix.(Description from back cover of trade paperback edition)
author: Amy Grech
